Opcode.Message: Events logged when the resource exhaustion resolver is started.
Opcode.Name: RDR_RES_OPCODE_LIFECYCLE_START

Opcode.Message: Events logged when the resource exhaustion resolver is stopped.
Opcode.Name: RDR_RES_OPCODE_LIFECYCLE_STOP

Opcode.Message: Events logged after a memory allocation.
Opcode.Name: RDR_RES_OPCODE_LIFECYCLE_ALLOC

Opcode.Message: Events logged when diagnosis is started.
Opcode.Name: RDR_RES_OPCODE_RESOLUTION_START

Opcode.Message: Events logged when diagnosis is stopped.
Opcode.Name: RDR_RES_OPCODE_RESOLUTION_STOP

Opcode.Message: Events logged after performing the resolution actions
Opcode.Name: RDR_RES_OPCODE_RESOLUTION_RESULT

Opcode.Message: Events logged before UI is launched.
Opcode.Name: RDR_RES_OPCODE_UI_START

Opcode.Message: Events logged after UI is launched or after an attempt to launch the UI is made.
Opcode.Name: RDR_RES_OPCODE_UI_DISPLAY

Opcode.Message: Events logged after an attempt to launch the leak diagnoser is made.
Opcode.Name: RDR_RES_OPCODE_LEAK_DIAGNOSIS_START

Event.Opcode: Events logged when the resource exhaustion resolver is started.
Event.Message: The Windows Resource Exhaustion Resolver started.

Event.Opcode: Events logged when the resource exhaustion resolver is stopped.
Event.Message: The Windows Resource Exhaustion Resolver stopped.

Event.Opcode: Events logged after performing the resolution actions
Event.Message: The Windows Resource Exhaustion Resolver received a notification that the computer is low on virtual memory. This notification was ignored as it is no longer valid.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TimeSinceLastUI" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="EventGenerationTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="EventType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DropReasonCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="TimesUIShown" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="MaxCommit" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Events logged before UI is launched.
Event.Message: The Windows Resource Exhaustion Resolver close programs UI was launched.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Process_1_Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Process_1_ID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Process_1_CreationTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="Process_1_Version" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Process_2_Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Process_2_ID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Process_2_CreationTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="Process_2_Version" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Process_3_Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Process_3_ID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Process_3_CreationTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="Process_3_Version" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResolverID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="EventGenerationTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Events logged when the resource exhaustion resolver is started.
Event.Message: The Windows Resource Exhaustion Resolver failed to start due to an error.

Event.Opcode: Events logged when the resource exhaustion resolver is stopped.
Event.Message: The Windows Resource Exhaustion Resolver failed to stop due to an error.

Event.Opcode: Events logged after a memory allocation.
Event.Message: The Windows Resource Exhaustion Resolver experienced a memory allocation failure.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RequestSize" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Events logged after UI is launched or after an attempt to launch the UI is made.
Event.Message: The Windows Resource Exhaustion Resolver failed to launch the close programs UI.

Event.Opcode: Events logged after UI is launched or after an attempt to launch the UI is made.
Event.Message: The Windows Resource Exhaustion Resolver close programs UI was closed.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="UIDisplayTime" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UserAction" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="MaxCommit" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Events logged after performing the resolution actions
Event.Message: Windows could not restore the computer's virtual memory. To prevent information loss, save your files and close your programs.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ReasonCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UserAction" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="MaxCommit" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Events logged after performing the resolution actions
Event.Message: Windows could not restore the computer's virtual memory because some programs could not be closed.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ReasonCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UserAction" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="MaxCommit" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Events logged after performing the resolution actions
Event.Message: Windows successfully restored your computer's virtual memory.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TimesUIShown" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="UserAction" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Events logged after performing the resolution actions
Event.Message: Windows successfully restored your computer's virtual memory without closing any programs.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TimesUIShown" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="UserAction" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Events logged after an attempt to launch the leak diagnoser is made.
Event.Message: The Windows Resource Exhaustion Resolver received a notification to perform memory leak diagnosis. This notification was processed and dropped.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProcessImageName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CreationTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="DropReasonCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Events logged when diagnosis is started.
Event.Message: The Windows Resource Exhaustion Resolver received an event from the Windows Resource Exhaustion Detector.

Event.Opcode: Events logged after performing the resolution actions
Event.Message: Windows could not restore the computer's virtual memory.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ResolutionAttempted" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Events logged after performing the resolution actions
Event.Message: The Windows Resource Exhaustion Resolver resolution failure notification UI was closed.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="UIDisplayTime" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UserAction" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="MaxCommit" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> </template>
